blocks.name: elun
blocks.content: Expansion of membership in class union. Theorem 12 of [Suppes] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm elun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cun(c1, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cun(c1, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cun(c1, c2))
  jaoi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c0, c2)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cun(c1, c2), wo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  df-un(hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÉ c2)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚à® c0 ‚àà c2))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÉ c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚à® c0 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, (c1 ‚ãÉ c2))
  jaoi(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c0, c2)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, (c1 ‚ãÉ c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚à® c0 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2))
  orbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, c1)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, c2)
  df-un(hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚à® c0 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: elunnel1
blocks.content: A member of a union that is not member of the first class, is member of the second class. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: uneqri
blocks.content: Inference from membership to union. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: unidm
blocks.content: Idempotent law for union of classes. Theorem 23 of [Suppes] p. 27. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: uncom
blocks.content: Commutative law for union of classes. Exercise 6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 17. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: equncom
blocks.content: If a class equals the union of two other classes, then it equals the union of those two classes commuted. ~ equncom was automatically derived from ~ equncomVD using the tools program translate_without_overwriting.cmd and minimizing. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 18-Feb-2012.)

blocks.name: equncomi
blocks.content: Inference form of ~ equncom . ~ equncomi was automatically derived from ~ equncomiVD using the tools program translate_without_overwriting.cmd and minimizing. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 18-Feb-2012.)

blocks.name: uneq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-1993.)

blocks.name: uneq2
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: uneq12
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 29-Mar-1998.)

blocks.name: uneq1i
blocks.content: Inference adding union to the right in a class equality. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: uneq2i
blocks.content: Inference adding union to the left in a class equality. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: uneq12i
blocks.content: Equality inference for the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 26-Jan-2007.)

blocks.name: uneq1d
blocks.content: Deduction adding union to the right in a class equality. (Contributed by NM, 29-Mar-1998.)

blocks.name: uneq2d

blocks.name: uneq12d
blocks.content: Equality deduction for the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: nfun
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the union of classes. (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cun(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cun(c0, c1), cab(hs0, wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  df-un(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfab(s0, hs0, wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfor(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ F/(s0,(c0 ‚ãÉ c1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1), { hs0 |(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c1)})
  df-un(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfab(s0, hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c1))
  nfor(s0, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: unass
blocks.content: Associative law for union of classes. Exercise 8 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 17. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm unass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(c0, cun(c1, c2)))
} = {
  uneqri(hs0, cun(c0, c1), c2, cun(c0, cun(c1, c2)))
  3bitrri(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, cun(c1, c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  elun(cv(hs0), c0, cun(c1, c2))
  orbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elun(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  bitr2i(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wo(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  orbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  elun(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  orass(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, cun(c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm unass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚ãÉ c2)=(c0 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚ãÉ c2))
} = {
  uneqri(hs0, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1), c2, (c0 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚ãÉ c2)))
  3bitrri((hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2), hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚ãÉ c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÉ c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  elun(hs0, c0, (c1 ‚ãÉ c2))
  orbi2i(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÉ c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2))
  elun(hs0, c1, c2)
  bitr2i((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2)), (hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c1)‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2))
  orbi1i(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), hs0 ‚àà c2, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c1))
  elun(hs0, c0, c1)
  orass(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ‚ãÉ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚ãÉ c2)))
}

blocks.name: ssequn1
blocks.content: A relationship between subclass and union. Theorem 26 of [Suppes] p. 27. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssequn1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c0, c1), c1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c0, c1), c1), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  3bitr4i(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wb(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  bicom(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  pm4.72(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  bibi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  elun(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c1)
  dfcleq(hs0, cun(c0, c1), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssequn1(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)= c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ‚äÜ c1, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1)= c1, ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c1)))
  albii(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c1))
  3bitr4i((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c1)), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c1)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c1))
  bicom(hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c1))
  pm4.72(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  bibi1i(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c1))
  elun(hs0, c0, c1)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c1)
  dfcleq(hs0, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ‚ãÉ c1))
}

blocks.name: unss
blocks.content: The union of two subclasses is a subclass. Theorem 27 of [Suppes] p. 27 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm unss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cun(c0, c2), c1))
} = {
  bitr2i(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cun(c0, c2), c1), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  dfss2(hs0, cun(c0, c2), c1)
  3bitr4i(wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wal(hs0, wa(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wa(wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  19.26(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  bitri(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wi(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elun(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  jaob(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  anbi12i(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c1)
  dfss2(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm unss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)‚äÜ c1)
} = {
  bitr2i((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (c0 ‚ãÉ c2)‚äÜ c1, ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)))
  dfss2(hs0, (c0 ‚ãÉ c2), c1)
  3bitr4i(‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)), (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ‚àÄ(hs0,((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))), (‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))))
  19.26(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))
  albii(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)))
  bitri((hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c2)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))
  imbi1i(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c2), hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® hs0 ‚àà c2))
  elun(hs0, c0, c2)
  jaob(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  anbi12i(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)))
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c1)
  dfss2(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ‚ãÉ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: unssi
blocks.content: An inference showing the union of two subclasses is a subclass. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 10-Dec-2002.)

blocks.name: unssad
blocks.content: If ` ( A u. B ) ` is contained in ` C ` , so is ` A ` . One-way deduction form of ~ unss . Partial converse of ~ unssd . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: unssbd
blocks.content: If ` ( A u. B ) ` is contained in ` C ` , so is ` B ` . One-way deduction form of ~ unss . Partial converse of ~ unssd . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: ssun
blocks.content: A condition that implies inclusion in the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2003.)

blocks.name: rexun
blocks.content: Restricted existential quantification over union. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0), wo(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
} = {
  bitri(wrex(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0), wo(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0)))
  df-rex(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0)
  3bitr4i(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0)), wo(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)), wex(s0, wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))), wo(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))))
  19.43(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))
  exbii(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0), wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0), wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wa(wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), w0))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0, wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  elun(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  andir(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)
  orbi12i(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  df-rex(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rex(s0, c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), w0)‚Üî(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)‚à® ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0)))
} = {
  bitri(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), w0), (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)‚à® ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0)), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚àß w0)))
  df-rex(s0, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1), w0)
  3bitr4i(‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚àß w0)), (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)‚à® ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0)), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)‚à®(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0))), (‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))‚à® ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0))))
  19.43(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0))
  exbii(s0, (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚àß w0), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)‚à®(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0)))
  bitri((s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚àß w0), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)‚à®(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0)), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß w0))
  anbi1i(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® s0 ‚àà c1))
  elun(s0, c0, c1)
  andir(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  orbi12i(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w0)))
  df-rex(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rex(s0, c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: ralunb
blocks.content: Restricted quantification over a union. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Apr-2011.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralunb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0), wa(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0)))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0), wa(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0)), wa(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0)), wa(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))), wal(s0, wa(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))))
  albii(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0), wa(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  bitri(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0), wa(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wi(wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), w0))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), w0, wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  elun(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  jaob(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)
  19.26(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))
  df-ral(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0)
  anbi12i(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
  df-ral(s0, c0, w0)
  df-ral(s0, c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralunb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), w0)‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0)))
} = {
  3bitr4i(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), w0), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0)), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚Üí w0)), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0))))
  bitri(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚Üí w0)), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0))), ‚àÄ(s0,((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0))))
  albii(s0, (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚Üí w0), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)))
  bitri((s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚Üí w0), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí w0))
  imbi1i(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ c1), w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à® s0 ‚àà c1))
  elun(s0, c0, c1)
  jaob(s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚àà c1, w0)
  19.26(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0))
  df-ral(s0, (c0 ‚ãÉ c1), w0)
  anbi12i(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, w0), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0)), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w0)))
  df-ral(s0, c0, w0)
  df-ral(s0, c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: ralun
blocks.content: Restricted quantification over union. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
